name: Mingzhi Li
body_text:
Hi Niraj,
I'm Mingzhi. I'm eager to explore the new Software Developer opening at Oracle. Could we connect for more info or a referral?
Kind regards,
Mingzhi.

name: Niraj P.
body_text:
Hi, Mingzhi,
Sure, we can connect. 
Please share your resume and we'll start from there. 
Regards
Niraj

name: Mingzhi Li
body_text:
Hi Niraj,

Thank you so much! I really appreciate your help.
 Please check the resume in the attachment. Job ID:281179.

name: Niraj P.
body_text:
Hey, Mingzhi,
 I checked your resume. It looks good. However, your experience is a bit less for this role. 
But I can refer you.

name: Mingzhi Li
body_text:
Hi Niraj,

Thank you so much! I really appreciate your help.

name: Niraj P.
body_text:
Hi Mingzhi, Please check your email. 
 No worries!
